title: Endymion Spring
description: Who or What is Endymion Spring?In the dead of night, a cloaked figure drags a heavy box through icy streets.The chest is magically sealed by a carved serpent's head--and can only be opened when its fangs taste blood.Centuries later, an ordinary boy touches a strange book and feels something sharp pierce his finger. The book is blank, wordless, but its paper seems to quiver...as if it is alive.Something terrifying has been unleashed...
author: Matthew Skelton
